name: Football
description: Football is a team sport played with a spherical ball between two teams of 11 players. It is the most popular sport in the world.

name: Cricket
description: Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players. It is widely regarded as the second most popular sport in the world.

name: Chess
description: Chess is a strategy board game played on a checkered gameboard with 64 squares. It is one of the oldest and most popular board games in the world.

name: Badminton
description: Badminton is a racquet sport played using racquets to hit a shuttlecock across a net. It is a popular recreational and competitive sport and cosly game.

name: Basketball
description: Basketball is a team sport played on a rectangular court. Players try to score by shooting a ball through the opponent's hoop.

name: Tennis
description: Tennis is a racket sport played between two players or two teams of two players each. It is played on a rectangular court divided by a net.
